Installation view, detail. Overgaden, Copenhagen

* [asterisk] (2002-12)

Anniversary for the publishing house * [asterisk]. Shown at Kunstpublikationer 2012, Overgaden, Copenhagen 11-27 May 2012

Work descriptions:
- All addresses, 2002-2012. Registrant of all the *[asterisk] journal subscribers' mailing addresses, collected and photographed by the editors of * [asterisk].
- Featured Releases 2012. A selection of * [asterisk]'s magazines and books.
- Editorial props 2002-2012.
